survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback on the usage and satisfaction of outdoor fitness equipment in public parks to improve future installations and maintenance.

questions.question_text: How often do you use outdoor fitness equipment in public parks?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure the options cover a broad range of usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you use outdoor fitness equipment in public parks?

questions.question_text: Which types of outdoor fitness equipment do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 response is not 'Never'.
questions.client_notes: Use multi-choice checkboxes. Include an 'Other' option to capture unlisted equipment.
